alreadyExportedDesc: This document has been exported to Feishu before. Continuing will create a new Feishu document instead of replacing the existing one.
exportInProgress: Previous export task is still in progress, please try again later
conversionTimeout: Conversion is taking too long, please check the result in Feishu client
extraError1000: Content blocks exceed 20,000 limit, excess truncated
extraError1001: Table cells exceed 2,000 limit, excess truncated
extraError1002: Table columns exceed 100 limit, excess truncated
extraError1003: Single paragraph exceeds 100,000 UTF-16 characters, excess truncated
extraError2000: Table columns exceed limit, excess truncated
extraError2001: Table cells exceed limit, excess truncated
extraError2003: Cloud storage insufficient, please contact admin
extraError2004: Some table images failed to upload
tokenDescription: Visit API Explorer to quickly get a temporary user_access_token (valid for ~2 hours). No need to add Bearer prefix when pasting.
tokenExpiredDesc: Your access token has expired or is invalid. Visit API Explorer to quickly get a temporary user_access_token (valid for ~2 hours).
tempFolderDescription: Folder for uploading temporary Markdown files, will be auto-deleted after conversion
tempFolderRequired: Please configure temporary upload folder in settings first
exportFailed: Export failed: Unable to get document content
uploadFailed: Upload failed: Unable to upload to Feishu Drive
importFailed: Conversion failed: Unable to convert to Feishu document
getRootFolderFailed: Unable to get Feishu Drive root folder
